screenshot.caption: OKT file open in OpenMPT 1

description: Armin Sander developed Oktalyzer in the 1980s, and Mayer Verlag distributed the commercial audio tracker in 1988 for Amiga computers. However, Sander discontinued the software in 1991, with the last version being 1.57.

Although Oktalyzer has been discontinued for many years, you may still encounter old OKT files created by the original application. In addition, you may also receive OKT files created by video game music enthusiasts using a third-party audio tracker.
